movements.name: Lead around and back
movements.description: With crossed hand hold, couples lead around anti-clockwise (6 bars). Dancers turn clockwise, the ladies under both raised arms (2 bars), and couples lead back to place (6 bars), face each other ('face up') and 'step it out' (2 bars).

movements.name: Swing
movements.description: With ceili hold (6 bars), finish facing centre and step it out (2 bars).

movements.name: Advance and retire twice
movements.description: With crossed hand hold.

movements.name: House around
movements.description: With the same hold, the gent's R fist above his L, face up and step it out.

movements.name: Swing
movements.description: Face centre and step it out.

movements.name: Ladies chain
movements.description: R hands in the centre and L to opposite gent who turns her clockwise underarm and dances anti-clockwise a ½ turn (4 bars). Ladies pass back R to R while gents dance ¾ turn clockwise to face their partners and step it out (4 bars).

movements.name: Swing
movements.description: Face centre and step it out.

movements.name: Advance and retire twice
movements.description: With crossed hand hold.

movements.name: House around
movements.description: With the same hold, the gent's R fist above his L, face up and step it out.

movements.name: Swing
movements.description: Face centre and step it out.
And when sides house around, tops join in to face up and step it out, swing and step it out.

movements.name: Swing
movements.description: Face centre and step it out.

movements.name: Back-to-back
movements.description: 1st gent and 2nd lady dance past each other R to R (2 bars), pass each other back to back (2 bars), fall back to face each other (2 bars) and step it out (2 bars).

movements.name: Swing
movements.description: The dancing couple swing, falling back to their own positions on the last 2 bars.

movements.name: Advance and retire twice
movements.description: With crossed hand hold.

movements.name: House around
movements.description: Face up and step it out.

movements.name: Swing
movements.description: Face centre and step it out.
With 1st gent (R of 1st tops) and 2nd lady leading.
With 2nd gent and 1st lady leading.
With 2nd gent and 1st lady leading and when sides house around, tops join in to face up and step it out, swing and step it out.

movements.name: Circle
movements.description: Advance and retire twice, dancers turning to face up and step it out as they retire for the second time.

movements.name: Swing
movements.description: Face centre and step it out.

movements.name: Advance and retire
movements.description: With waist hold (4 bars), drop hands and advance again each turning outwards 1 turn, face up and step it out (4 bars).

movements.name: Swing
movements.description: Face centre and step it out.  On the last two bars 2nd top couple dances in to join them in the centre.

movements.name: Swing four
movements.description: Falling back to place on the last 2 bars.

movements.name: Swing
movements.description: Face centre and step it out.
1st side couple now leads with 2nd side couple.
2nd top couple now leads with 1st top couple.
2nd side couple now leads with 1st side couple, and when sides house around, tops join in to face up and step it out, swing and step it out.

movements.name: Circle
movements.description: And on the last 2 bars the ladies dance on to the gent on their R and take waltz hold.

movements.name: Polka round
movements.description: New couples polka round to the next place on the gents' R.
And ladies dance on to their own partners.
